description: React functional component for the frontend of a stock growth analysis application. It manages state, handles form submissions, displays errors, warnings, and results in a table.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: Functional component that renders the stock growth analyzer interface, manages local state, and handles submission logic.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Async handler function that calls analyzeGrowth API with the payload, updates state based on the response, and handles errors.
